snippet: The boy, Shakie Kamara, 15, died of bleeding and hypothermic shock after being shot in the legs when soldiers fired into a crowd trying to leave a quarantined area in Monrovia, Liberia.
abstract: Fifteen-year-old boy Shakie Kamara dies of gunshot wounds sustained during clash with Liberian soldiers over Ebola quarantine.
lead_paragraph: The boy, Shakie Kamara, 15, died of bleeding and hypothermic shock after being shot in the legs when soldiers fired into a crowd trying to leave a quarantined area in Monrovia, Liberia.

headline.main: Liberian Boy Dies After Being Shot During Clash Over Ebola Quarantine
headline.print_headline: Liberia: Boy Dies From Wounds After Clash Over Ebola Quarantine
